sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Form, Col, InputGroup, Button, OverlayTrigger, Tooltip, Table, Card } from 'react-bootstrap'; import '../index.css' class BondPricingOne extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { currentBond: null, priceTotal: null, month: this.getCurrentMonth(), year: this.getCurrentYear(), showTooltip: { visibility: 'visible' }, hideTable: true }; this.onUpdateEnter = this.onUpdateEnter.bind(this) this.onSubmit = this.onSubmit.bind(this) this.formatDate = this.formatDate.bind(this) } formatDate(value_date) { const months = { "01": "Jan", "02": "Feb", "03": "Mar", "04": "Apr", "05": "May", "06": "June", "07": "Jul", "08": "Aug", "09": "Sept", "10": "Oct", "11": "Nov", "12": "Dec" } let month = value_date.split('/')[0] let year = value_date.split('/')[1] let month_string = months[month] + ' 1, ' + year console.log(month_string) return month_string } getCurrentMonth() { let d = new Date(); return d.getMonth() + 1 } getCurrentYear() { let d = new Date(); return d.getFullYear() } appendToTable() { const { currentBond } = this.state function handleClickX(element) { element.parentNode.parentNode.remove() let rows = document.getElementById('bond-table').getElementsByTagName('tr') if (rows.length === 2) { element.parentNode.parentNode.remove() document.getElementById('bond-table').getElementsByTagName('tr')[0].style.visibility = 'hidden' } } const bondTable = document.getElementById('bond-table') bondTable.getElementsByTagName('tr')[0].style.visibility = 'visible' let bondRow = bondTable.insertRow(1); bondRow.style.textAlign = 'center' bondRow.insertCell(0).innerHTML = currentBond['serialNumber'] bondRow.insertCell(1).innerHTML = currentBond['series'] bondRow.insertCell(2).innerHTML = currentBond['denomination'] bondRow.insertCell(3).innerHTML = currentBond['iDate'] bondRow.insertCell(4).innerHTML = currentBond['aDate'] bondRow.insertCell(5).innerHTML = currentBond['mDate'] let cell6 = bondRow.insertCell(6) cell6.className = 'issue-price' cell6.innerHTML = '$' + currentBond['iPrice'] let cell7 = bondRow.insertCell(7) cell7.className = 'bond-interest' cell7.innerHTML = '$' + currentBond['interest'] let cell8 = bondRow.insertCell(8) cell8.className = 'bond-value' cell8.innerHTML = '$' + currentBond['value'] cell8.style.position = 'relative' let span = document.createElement('span') span.innerHTML = '×' span.setAttribute('aria-hidden', 'true') span.style.border = 'none'; let button = document.createElement('button') button.onclick = function () { handleClickX(this); }; button.className = 'close' button.style.position = 'absolute' button.style.right = '-1em' button.append(span); cell8.append(button); let rows = bondTable.getElementsByTagName('tr') let prices = [] for (let i in rows) { if (!isNaN(i)) { if (i > 0 && i < (rows.length - 1)) { let issue_prices = rows[i].getElementsByClassName('issue-price') for (let j in issue_prices) { let issue_price = issue_prices[j].innerHTML if (issue_price !== undefined) { prices.push(parseFloat(issue_price.substring(1))) } } } } } let price_total = parseFloat(prices.reduce((a, b) => a + b, 0)).toFixed(2) bondPriceTotal = () => { return price_total } } onUpdateEnter(e) { e.preventDefault(); setTimeout(() => { this.setState({ showTooltip: { visibility: 'hidden' } }) }, 3500) } onSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault(); if (this.state.hideTable) { this.setState({ hideTable: false }) } const series_map = { 'EE Bond': 'EE', 'E Bond': 'E', 'I Bond': 'I', 'Savings Bond': 'S' } let bond = { 'vMonth': e.target.aMonth.value, 'vYear': e.target.aYear.value, 'series': series_map[e.target.series.value], 'denomination': (e.target.denomination.value).substring(1), 'serialNumber': e.target.serialnumber.value, 'iMonth': e.target.iMonth.value, 'iYear': e.target.iYear.value } const requestOptions = { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin': '*' }, body: JSON.stringify({ bond }) }; fetch('http://localhost:5000/individual/bonds', requestOptions) .then(response => response.json()) .then(response => { this.setState({ currentBond: response }); }) } render() { return (
VALUE AS OF / Revalue all bonds by this date. }> SERIES DENOMINATION SERIAL NUMBER ISSUE DATE /
{this.state.currentBond ? PRICED FROM {this.formatDate(this.state.currentBond['vDate'])} : null} TOTAL PRICE {this.state.priceTotal} TOTAL INTEREST TOTAL VALUE
{this.state.currentBond ? this.appendToTable() : null}
Serial Number Series Denomination Issue Date Next Accrual Final Maturity Issue Price Interest Value
) } } export default BondPricingOne;
